messages.title: IT'S TIME FOR REAL CHANGE
messages.content: After nearly a decade of cuts, it's time for real change. Labour will rebuild and transform Britain, so that no one is left behind.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: More doctors, more nurses, and free prescriptions.
To tackle the climate emergency and create secure jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Introduce a Real Living Wage of at least Â£10 per hour
keyPolicies.policyDescription: For all workers, to give everyone a decent standard of living.
Tackling poverty and providing help for those who need it most.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Get Brexit sorted within six months
keyPolicies.policyDescription: By giving you the final say on Brexit.
And bring social housing back to where it's needed most.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit sorted within six months. By giving you the final say on Brexit.
issues.environment: Kick-start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create secure jobs.
issues.health: More doctors, more nurses, and free prescriptions.
issues.socialWelfare: End food bank Britain. Tackling poverty and providing help for those who need it most.

housing.content: Build a million affordable homes and bring social housing back to where it's needed most.

images.caption: Labour's Plan for Real Change leaflet cover.
